Text: I have had #1 - 11 for MONTHS waiting for someone to scan #12 - Thankyou to Minutemen-IAmJack'sLiver - :D

Wow this was awsome, I'm currently penciling a comic about the authorship of Shakespeare's work, it's basically about several different poeple claiming to be the real author of his works. Its sorta a crime noir, i'll post it when ever i finish It (if I ever finish it, lol), this is a great comic, The authorship debate is actually a real thing
@SINPatria - De Vere all the way!!! Throw ur comic up here when youre done :D

Thanks a bunch for this, Mr D. It was a real pain in the ass to find the single issues at the LCS or as scans. Extra points to you for having separate files in the torrent.

Classy work, man.
